verses.verse: And after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> power; <S%G1849><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> was lightened <S%G5461><s%> with his glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And he cried <S%G2896><s%> mightily <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2479><s%> with a strong <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> is fallen, <S%G4098><s%> is fallen, <S%G4098><s%> and is become <S%G1096><s%> the habitation <S%G2732><s%> of devils, <S%G1142><s%> and the hold <S%G5438><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> foul <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and a cage <S%G5438><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> unclean <S%G169><s%> and hateful <S%G3404><s%> bird. <S%G3732><s%>

For all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> have drunk of the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of her fornication, <S%G4202><s%> and the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have committed <S%G4203><s%> fornication <S%G4203><s%> with her, and the merchants <S%G1713><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> are waxed <S%G4147><s%> rich <S%G4147><s%> through <S%G1537><s%> the abundance <S%G1411><s%> of her delicacies. <S%G4764><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> another <S%G243><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Come <S%G1831><s%> out of her, my people, <S%G2992><s%> that you be not partakers <S%G4790><s%> of her sins, <S%G266><s%> and that you receive <S%G2983><s%> not of her plagues. <S%G4127><s%>
For her sins <S%G266><s%> have reached <S%G190><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> has remembered <S%G3421><s%> her iniquities. <S%G92><s%>

Reward <S%G591><s%> her even <S%G2532><s%> as she rewarded <S%G591><s%> you, and double <S%G1363><s%> to her double <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1362><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to her works: <S%G2041><s%> in the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> she has filled <S%G2767><s%> fill <S%G2767><s%> to her double. <S%G1362><s%>

How <S%G3745><s%> much <S%G3745><s%> she has glorified <S%G1392><s%> herself, <S%G1438><s%> and lived deliciously, <S%G4763><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> much <S%G5118><s%> torment <S%G929><s%> and sorrow <S%G3997><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> her: for she said <S%G3004><s%> in her heart, <S%G2588><s%> I sit <S%G2521><s%> a queen, <S%G938><s%> and am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> widow, <S%G5503><s%> and shall see <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> sorrow. <S%G3997><s%>

Therefore <S%G5124><s%> shall her plagues <S%G4127><s%> come <S%G2240><s%> in one <S%G3391><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and mourning, <S%G3997><s%> and famine; <S%G3042><s%> and she shall be utterly <S%G2618><s%> burned <S%G2618><s%> with fire: <S%G4442><s%> for strong <S%G2478><s%> is the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> judges <S%G2919><s%> her.

And the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> have committed <S%G4203><s%> fornication <S%G4203><s%> and lived deliciously <S%G4763><s%> with her, shall mourn <S%G2799><s%> her, and lament <S%G2875><s%> for her, when <S%G3752><s%> they shall see <S%G991><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of her burning, <S%G4451><s%>

Standing <S%G2476><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off <S%G575><s%> for the fear <S%G5401><s%> of her torment, <S%G929><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Alas, <S%G3759><s%> alas <S%G3759><s%> that great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> Babylon, <S%G897><s%> that mighty <S%G2478><s%> city! <S%G4172><s%> for in one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> is your judgment <S%G2920><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

And the merchants <S%G1713><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall weep <S%G2799><s%> and mourn <S%G3996><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> her; for no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> buys <S%G59><s%> their merchandise <S%G1117><s%> any <S%G3765><s%> more: <S%G3765><s%>

The merchandise <S%G1117><s%> of gold, <S%G5557><s%> and silver, <S%G696><s%> and precious <S%G5093><s%> stones, <S%G3037><s%> and of pearls, <S%G3135><s%> and fine linen, <S%G1040><s%> and purple, <S%G4209><s%> and silk, <S%G4596><s%> and scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> thyine <S%G2367><s%> wood, <S%G3586><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> manner vessels <S%G4632><s%> of ivory, <S%G1661><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> manner vessels <S%G4632><s%> of most precious <S%G5093><s%> wood, <S%G3586><s%> and of brass, <S%G5475><s%> and iron, <S%G4604><s%> and marble, <S%G3139><s%>

And cinnamon, <S%G2792><s%> and odors, <S%G2368><s%> and ointments, <S%G3464><s%> and frankincense, <S%G3030><s%> and wine, <S%G3631><s%> and oil, <S%G1637><s%> and fine <S%G4585><s%> flour, <S%G4585><s%> and wheat, <S%G4621><s%> and beasts, <S%G2934><s%> and sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and horses, <S%G2462><s%> and chariots, <S%G4480><s%> and slaves, <S%G4983><s%> and souls <S%G5590><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

And the fruits <S%G3703><s%> that your soul <S%G5590><s%> lusted <S%G1937><s%> after are departed <S%G565><s%> from you, and all <S%G3956><s%> things which <S%G3588><s%> were dainty <S%G3045><s%> and goodly <S%G2986><s%> are departed <S%G565><s%> from you, and you shall find <S%G2147><s%> them no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> at all. <S%G3364><s%>

The merchants <S%G1713><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things, which <S%G3588><s%> were made <S%G4147><s%> rich <S%G4147><s%> by her, shall stand <S%G2476><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off <S%G575><s%> for the fear <S%G5401><s%> of her torment, <S%G929><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> and wailing, <S%G3996><s%>

And saying, <S%G3004><s%> Alas, <S%G3759><s%> alas <S%G3759><s%>that great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> that was clothed <S%G4016><s%> in fine linen, <S%G1039><s%> and purple, <S%G4210><s%> and scarlet, <S%G2847><s%> and decked <S%G5558><s%> with gold, <S%G5557><s%> and precious <S%G5093><s%> stones, <S%G3037><s%> and pearls! <S%G3135><s%>

For in one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> great <S%G5118><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> is come <S%G2049><s%> to nothing. <S%G2049><s%> And every <S%G3956><s%> shipmaster, <S%G2942><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the company <S%G3658><s%> in ships, <S%G4143><s%> and sailors, <S%G3492><s%> and as many <S%G3745><s%> as trade <S%G2038><s%> by sea, <S%G2281><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off, <S%G575><s%>

And cried <S%G2896><s%> when they saw <S%G3708><s%> the smoke <S%G2586><s%> of her burning, <S%G4451><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to this great <S%G3173><s%> city! <S%G4172><s%>

And they cast <S%G906><s%> dust <S%G5522><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their heads, <S%G2776><s%> and cried, <S%G2896><s%> weeping <S%G2799><s%> and wailing, <S%G3996><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Alas, <S%G3759><s%> alas <S%G3759><s%>that great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> were made <S%G4147><s%> rich <S%G4147><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that had <S%G2192><s%> ships <S%G4143><s%> in the sea <S%G2281><s%> by reason <S%G1537><s%> of her costliness! <S%G5094><s%> for in one hour <S%G5610><s%> is she made <S%G2049><s%> desolate. <S%G2049><s%>

Rejoice <S%G2165><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> her, you heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and you holy <S%G40><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and prophets; <S%G4396><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> has avenged <S%G2919><s%> you on <S%G1537><s%> her.

And a mighty <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> took <S%G142><s%> up a stone <S%G3037><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> millstone, <S%G3458><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> with violence <S%G3731><s%> shall that great <S%G3173><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> be thrown <S%G906><s%> down, and shall be found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> at all. <S%G3364><s%>

And the voice <S%G5456><s%> of harpers, <S%G2790><s%> and musicians, <S%G3451><s%> and of pipers, <S%G834><s%> and trumpeters, <S%G4538><s%> shall be heard <S%G191><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> at all <S%G3364><s%> in you; and no <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3364><s%> craftsman, <S%G5079><s%> of whatever <S%G3956><s%> craft <S%G5078><s%> he be, shall be found <S%G2147><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> in you; and the sound <S%G5456><s%> of a millstone <S%G3458><s%> shall be heard <S%G191><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> at all <S%G3364><s%> in you;

And the light <S%G5457><s%> of a candle <S%G3088><s%> shall shine <S%G5316><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> at all <S%G3364><s%> in you; and the voice <S%G5456><s%> of the bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> and of the bride <S%G3565><s%> shall be heard <S%G191><s%> no <S%G3364><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> at all <S%G3364><s%> in you: for your merchants <S%G1713><s%> were the great <S%G3175><s%> men of the earth; <S%G1093><s%> for by your sorceries <S%G5331><s%> were all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> deceived. <S%G4105><s%>
And in her was found <S%G2147><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and of saints, <S%G40><s%> and of all <S%G3956><s%> that were slain <S%G4969><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
